subject: Basketball (College)
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Zach LeDay scored 18 points in the second half and blocked London Perrantes’s attempt to tie the game in the final seconds as host Virginia Tech (10-5, 2-0 Atlantic Coast Conference) won a 70-68 stunner over No. 4 Virginia (12-2, 1-1).
snippet: Zach LeDay scored 18 points in the second half and blocked London Perrantes’s attempt to tie the game in the final seconds as host Virginia Tech (10-5, 2-0 Atlantic Coast Conference) won a 70-68 stunner over No. 4 Virginia (12-2, 1-1).
